practice_phrases: When I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候。
I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
When I didn't sleep very well last week.
上周当我没睡好的时候。
I don't worry about making mistakes when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我不担心犯错。
I don't enjoy doing interesting things when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢做有趣的事情。
When I didn't sleep well I don't care about making mistakes.
当我没睡好的时候我不在乎犯错。
I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well last week.
上周当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
When I didn't sleep well I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.
当我没睡好的时候我不是在试着尽快完成。
I don't enjoy doing interesting things with my friends when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。
When I didn't sleep well last week I wanted to write a letter to his friend.
上周当我没睡好的时候我想给他的朋友写封信。
lego: when I didn't sleep very well

practice_phrases: Didn't sleep well.
没睡好。
I didn't sleep well last week.
我上周没睡好。
He didn't sleep well when he worried.
他担心的时候没睡好。
I didn't sleep well but I finished everything.
我没睡好但我完成了所有事情。
She didn't sleep well so she didn't enjoy waking up.
她没睡好所以不喜欢醒来。
I didn't sleep well last week but I didn't worry about it.
我上周没睡好但我不担心。
He didn't sleep well because he wanted to write a letter to his friend.
他没睡好因为他想给他的朋友写封信。
I didn't sleep well last week when I was trying to finish as quickly as possible.
上周当我在试着尽快完成的时候我没睡好。
She didn't sleep well but she enjoyed doing interesting things with her friends.
她没睡好但她喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。
I didn't sleep well last week when I wanted to put his letter in her bag.
上周当我想把他的信放进她的包里的时候我没睡好。
Sleep well.
睡好。
I want to sleep well.
我想睡好。
I need to sleep well to learn.
我需要睡好才能学习。
He wanted to sleep well last week.
他上周想睡好。
I enjoy trying to sleep well when I can.
我喜欢试着睡好。
I think it's a good thing to sleep well.
我认为睡好是件好事。
She wanted to sleep well last week to do interesting things.
她上周想睡好来做有趣的事情。
I'm not trying to sleep well as quickly as possible if you know what I mean.
如果你知道我的意思的话我不是在试着尽快睡好。
He wanted to sleep well last week to write a letter to his friend.
他上周想睡好来给他的朋友写封信。
I enjoy trying to sleep well when I do interesting things with my friends.
当我和朋友做有趣的事情时我喜欢试着睡好。
Don't enjoy.
不喜欢。
I don't enjoy making mistakes.
我不喜欢犯错。
I don't enjoy waking up early.
我不喜欢早醒来。
I don't enjoy writing letters sometimes.
我有时不喜欢写信。
He didn't enjoy sleeping when he worried.
他担心的时候不喜欢睡觉。
I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
She didn't enjoy doing everything as quickly as possible last week.
她上周不喜欢尽快做所有事情。
I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep well if you know what I mean.
如果你知道我的意思的话当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
He didn't enjoy writing a letter to his friend when he didn't sleep well.
当他没睡好的时候他不喜欢给他的朋友写封信。
I don't enjoy trying to do interesting things with my friends when I didn't sleep well last week.
上周当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢试着和朋友做有趣的事情。
Wake up.
醒来。
I want to wake up.
我想醒来。

我不喜欢早醒来。
He wanted to wake up last week.
他上周想醒来。

当我担心的时候我不喜欢醒来。

当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢尽快醒来。

当他没睡好的时候他不喜欢醒来和朋友做有趣的事情。
